sentences.en: Augustine replaces personality and humanity with the paramountcy and universality of God.
sentences.cn: 奥古斯丁以上帝的至上性、普遍性消解了个性、人性.

sentences.en: But that should not deter us from seeing its nobility and universality.
sentences.cn: 但这不应阻碍我们看到它的高贵和普遍性.

sentences.en: Group discussions are valuable to ascertain the universality of comments.
sentences.cn: 要去确认多方面的评论,团体的讨论是有用的.

sentences.en: I have been amazed at the universality of all of our experiences, whatever our origins, sex or age.
sentences.cn: 尽管我们的身世、性别和年龄各不相同，但令我惊讶的是我们都有着共同的经历。

sentences.en: It is characterized by imagery, encouragement , self - awareness , universality and temporal nature.
sentences.cn: 它在启迪智慧 、 民化俗 、 真崇美、情养性等方面发挥着独特的功能.

sentences.en: It is precisely in the particularity of contradiction that the universality of contradiction resides.
sentences.cn: 矛盾的普遍性即寓于矛盾的特殊性之中.

sentences.en: One might question the universality of this method.
sentences.cn: 有人会怀疑这个方法的普遍性.

sentences.en: Secondly, the relationship between universality and specificity.
sentences.cn: 第二，普遍性与特殊性的关系。

sentences.en: The beauty of Newton's method is its universality.
sentences.cn: 牛顿法的优点是它的通用性.

sentences.en: The biothythm is discussed from the universality of the biological world.
sentences.cn: 生物节律是从生物界的普遍性而言的.

sentences.en: The former symbolizes power, unification and universality, and the latter fertility.
sentences.cn: 前者象征权力统一寰宇, 后者象征子嗣昌盛.

sentences.en: The hologram package is the functional unit embodying the universality of hologram.
sentences.cn: 全息包是体现全息普遍性的功能单位.

sentences.en: The universality of contradiction resides in the particularity of contradiction.
sentences.cn: 矛盾的普遍性存在于矛盾的特殊性之中。

sentences.en: The universality of the law of conservation of energy was not generally accepted until 1847.
sentences.cn: 能量守恒定律的普适性直到1847年才得到公认.

sentences.en: There exist arguments between universality of human rights and cultural relativity.
sentences.cn: 普世人权观和相对主义之间存在着争论.

sentences.en: This measure has universality and can suit for almost all models.
sentences.cn: 该方法具有通用性,几乎所有的模型都可用其求解.

sentences.en: Unless the passion of it is to die down, it must somehow assert its universality.
sentences.cn: 除非爱情熄灭, 它会肯定自己的普遍性.

words.tran_cn: 普遍的；通用的；宇宙的；全世界的；全体的
普遍主义；普遍性；普救论
信普救说者；普遍主义者
[统物]普遍性；广泛性；一般性；多方面性

trans.tran_cn: 普遍性，通用性，普适性，一般性
trans.tran_en: the state or quality of being universal
